sense.name: decide or establish how much something costs
sense.commentary: Note: Also includes the act of marking or labeling an item with a price.
sense.examples: He priced the antique clock at $700. Archives priced it at $19.95. Look at these shoes that are priced at $900! We spent the entire morning pricing the new merchandise.

sense.name: find out how much something costs
sense.examples: I priced a few computers before deciding which one to buy. The value of this is greater than when I priced it four years ago. She spent last week pricing wedding dresses.
